title: Ravenvale
description: Lily Underwood is a normal teenager or at least she thought she was until her aunt dies. With no parents, she has no choice but to go live with her grandmother she never knew about in a strange place called Ravenvale. Suddenly, all of the people she knew start dying one by one, all murdered. She must now find this ‘mysterious killer’ and also the truth about her origin. She’s not a normal human being; she’s a witch, a descendant of the most powerful witches in the world. Along with the search of this mysterious killer, she also has to find about what really happened to her parents. The truth about their tragic death. And the truth is horrifying. Will she be able to fight the evil? Will she be able to find the truth? Will she subsist?
author: Isha Sharma
